install.name: RokNewsPager
install.author: RocketTheme, LLC
install.description: RokNewsPager is a horizontal paging latest news module

param.name: load_css
param.label: Load built-in StyleSheet
param.description: whether to load builtin CSS files. Useful when you want to write your own style and don't want to overwrite.

param.name: theme
param.label: Theme
param.description: Theme type you want to load: light or dark styles

param.name: content_type
param.label: Content Type
param.description: whether to use Joomla Core Content, or K2 Content

param.name: show_front
param.label: Joomla Frontpage Items
param.description: Show frontpage articles in this module

param.name: category_id
param.label: K2 Filter items by category
param.description: Select one ore more categories for which you want to filter an items list. Select none to fetch items from all categories.

param.name: article_count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of items to display (default 5)

param.name: show_accordion
param.label: Enable Accordion Effect
param.description: Enable Accordion Effect for this module

param.name: show_paging
param.label: Enable Paging
param.description: Enable Paging for this module

param.name: maxpages
param.label: Max Pages
param.description: The number of pages (default 8)

param.name: show_title
param.label: Show Title
param.description: Enable item title for articles.

param.name: show_thumbnails
param.label: Show Thumbnails
param.description: Enable item image thumbnails for this module

param.name: thumbnail_link
param.label: Use Thumbnail as link
param.description: Use the thumbnail as a link to the article

param.name: show_overlay
param.label: Show Thumbnail Overlay
param.description: Enable an image overlay for the thumbnails

param.name: show_ratings
param.label: Show Item Ratings
param.description: Show the article ratings for each item

param.name: show_readmore
param.label: Show Readmore Link
param.description: Show the Readmore Text for each item

param.name: readmore_text
param.label: Read More Text
param.description: The text to show for the read more link.

param.name: show_preview_text
param.label: Show Preview Text
param.description: Show the Preview Text

param.name: strip_tags
param.label: Allowed HTML tags
param.description: List the HTML tags you want to allow in your content, separated by comma. All the others will be stripped out.

param.name: preview_count
param.label: Preview Length
param.description: Length of characters of article to preview

param.name: show_comment_count
param.label: Show Comment Count
param.description: Show the Comment Count if comments are enabled and the comment system is available

param.name: show_author
param.label: Show Author
param.description: Show the Author

param.name: show_published_date
param.label: Show Published Date
param.description: Show the published date which is the newer of the created date or the start publishing date

param.name: autoupdate
param.label: Auto Update
param.description: Auto updates the news

param.name: autoupdate_delay
param.label: Auto Update Delay
param.description: Delay from each auto update request

param.name: module_ident
param.label: Module Indentification
param.description: Load module data by Name or ID (requires com_rokmodule v1.1 or later)

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached
